name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
description:
Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog is a top-down 2D adventure game inspired by true events in Bangkok, Thailand 2017. The game lets you experience a harsh life of a homeless man who tries to cope with his mental struggle of the cruelty of the world. The story is framed by an interview he gives to a famous blogger, about how a chance encounter with a stray dog made him regain his sense of self once more.



What could make a man homeless? Is it one's family's financial situation? Is it the government? Is it because of our friends? Or... is it because of oneself?

Explore a journey from his childhood to the present. Unravel what made a man lose everything.

Features

  • Experience the struggle of a homeless man's and a stray dog's life.
  • Traverse the life of a homeless man through his past in Thailand's rural areas.
  • Show different ways to show affections for the dog.
  • The game tells thought-provoking ways of how to live a proper life.
  • If you are sensitive about animals, friends, or family, I can't guarantee that you won't cry.
